The following documentation is available:
An HTML version of the terminatorX online manual. If you have GNOME2's yelp installed you should be able to read this manual by selecting it from the Help menu.
Brianbredfern@calarts.edu wrote a nice QuickToot tutorial on terminatorX. Check it out here
If you're stuck on installing terminatorX I recommend having a look at the INSTALL file.
I also maintain a Frequently Asked Questions document.

Additionally there's a
HTML version of the aseqjoy man page.
And a rather old description on how I turned by broken turntable into terminatorX turntable.
